title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-2.8 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 67-2.8 - Enforcement

State Regulations

When an owner of a dwelling fails to comply with a written notice and demand for discontinuance of a condition conducive to lead poisoning, the proceedures for enforcement, including formal hearings, receivership and cooperation and assistance from those public officers, departments and agencies of the State and its political subdivisions, as provided in sections
1373, 1374, and
1375
of the Public Health Law, shall be followed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
67-2.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
